name: flux Coordination Tasks
description: Active coordination tasks managed by flux

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Review and optimize API endpoint implementation for TRAIN component and gallery feature based on technical audit findings. Focus on error handling and webhooks.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Technical infrastructure audit revealed gaps in API implementation and error handling. Need to ensure robust endpoint implementation before scaling.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Review infrastructure costs and optimize storage usage for TRAIN component. Develop cost optimization strategy for model storage and training.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Technical audit revealed potential cost optimization opportunities in model storage and training infrastructure.

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Review the new Flux LoRA prompting guide and ensure style consultation outputs align with our prompting parameters. Specific focus needed on wardrobe psychology and brand color integration. Please provide feedback on style-specific parameters and suggest any additions needed for style consultation integration.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: We're optimizing the style consultation flow and image generation parameters for SSELFIE Studio launch. This coordination ensures seamless integration between style consultation and image generation processes.
